item.title: NHANES Weartime Vignette
item.description: NHANES 2011-2014 Weartime Vignette Table of contents Background Weartime in NHANES 2011-2014 Distributions of wake, sleep, nonwear, unkown Wake, sleep, unknown >22 Hours of Sleep >22 Hours of Wake Large amounts of unknown Patterns of wake, sleep wear by age Final criteria NHANES 2011-2014 Weartime Vignette CodeShow All CodeHide All CodeView Source Background When analyzing accelerometry data collected in free living settings, weartime estimation is a crucial first step. If an individual isn’t actually wearing her device, we don’t want to estimate her physical activity as zero!
